miniGames.ships

Class ShipsBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • miniGames.ships.ShipsBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ShipsBoard
extends Thread
    class ShipsBoard represents a board, stores the data of board and provides methods to check state of fields after shoot
    Author:
    Wociech Stokłosa
    See Also:
    ShipsField, Ship

    • Field Detail

      • body

        private final ImageIcon body
        icon of horizontal ship

      • bodyP

        private final ImageIcon bodyP
        icon of vertical located ship

      • DestroyedShips

        private int DestroyedShips
        Number of totally destroyed ships on the board. If numberOfShips == DestroyedShips game if over and ovner of this board loose the game.

      • Fields

        private ShipsField[][] Fields
        array of fields.

      • NumberOfShips

        private int NumberOfShips
        Number of ships on this board;

      • Ships

        private Ship[] Ships
        array of ships on this board.

      • ShootedFields

        private boolean[][] ShootedFields
        array of states of fields. true = field was shooted, false in other case

      • SizeX

        private int SizeX
        horizontal size of board. In other words number of fields in each row of the board

      • SizeY

        private int SizeY
        vertical size of board. In other words number of fields in each column of board.

      • water

        private final ImageIcon water
        icon of water, used in thread to animate waves

      • water2

        private final ImageIcon water2
        icon of alternative water, used in thread to animate waves

        public boolean isFieldShooted(int x,
                     int y)
        get state of each field
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of field on the x-axis
        y - coordinate of field on the y-axis
        Returns:
        true if field was already shooted, else in other case

      • Shoot

        public int Shoot(int x,
        int y)
        method called when opponent shoot at this board
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of shoot on the x-axis
        y - coordinate of shoot on the y-axis
        Returns:
        if ship is destroyed return 1, if there is a ship return 2, else return 3, if player lost return 4;
